knimeNode.name: WebBrowser
knimeNode.shortDescription: Opens a web browser to a genome browser.

fullDescription.intro:
Opens a web browser to a genome browser.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
This nodes uses the Picard Library to read the BAMs.
fullDescription.option: The VCF POS column. The genomic position (1-based)
